alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Harris; Liberty; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 5:02PM CDT until September 08 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Montgomery County in southeastern Texas... Northwestern Chambers County in southeastern Texas... Southwestern Liberty County in southeastern Texas... Northeastern Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 502 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Houston, or near Kingwood, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northern Baytown, Humble, Kingwood, Barrett, Highlands, Channelview, Crosby, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Woodbranch, Plum Grove, Atascocita, Houston Gardens, East Houston, Lake Houston Dam, Lake Houston, Hunterwood, Sheldon, East Little York / Homestead and Settegast. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
